channel.title: Need some input on what i should do in this script
channel.description:
I'm still working on that solitaire script. Right now i've got most the procedures i'm going to need to call on later.
Dealing w/ aces Moving cards from one slot to another Drawing new cards Flipping cards
now i need to make it smart :P
One issue i do have is flipping my aces, when i have more than 1 ace up it sends them to the top and flips new cards, but it continues to try to flip cards a few more times. I figure thats due to the variables i'm using to count how many aces there are(I'm sure theres a better way than what i'm using). I could use some help with that to see what i'm doing wrong.
For the main procedure for figuring out what cards to move and such i know i can simply use a shit load of If statements, but i want to slim it down and make it faster than that. I goofed around with numbering each card 1-52, say(for instance) the 5 of hearts is number 18, well if the 6 of spades or clubs are up i could simply see if either of their numbers are up, i.e. 24, 47*random numbers* then i could use cases to set the variables for the MoveCard; procedure
Thats the most compact and quick way i can think of.
also i have to go through and re-do the FindCardSlotOne; into cases and seperate each slot up so i can just call on the one i need to re-read instead of wasting time reading all 7.
If somebody can help me think of a better way for the main procedure that would be awesome :)
Remember, this script is kind of haggard at the moment i'm just trying to get theory into pratice then i'll refine it later, so don't be too harsh ;)
